column1: Apply the rule only if the following conditions are met (leave blank for all products).
column2: Apply the rule only if the following conditions are met (leave blank for all products).

column1: One method name per line, e.g Next Day Air
column2: One method name per line, e.g Next Day Air

column1: Apply this rule with coupon only. Create coupon in %1 area first. Useful when you have ONE coupon only.
column2: Apply this rule with coupon only. Create coupon in %1 area first. Useful when you have ONE coupon only.

column1: Apply this rule with ANY coupon from specified discount rule. Create rule in %1 area first. Useful when you have MULTIPLE coupons in one rule.
column2: Apply this rule with ANY coupon from specified discount rule. Create rule in %1 area first. Useful when you have MULTIPLE coupons in one rule.

column1: Apply the rules for selected days of week only. Set empty for all days.
column2: Apply the rules for selected days of week only. Set empty for all days.

column1: If a product matches several rules, the first rule will be applied only.
column2: If a product matches several rules, the first rule will be applied only.

column1: Select products or leave blank for all products.
column2: Select products or leave blank for all products.

column1: If the option is set to `No`, totals below will be applied only to items with non-free shipping.
column2: If the option is set to `No`, totals below will be applied only to items with non-free shipping.

column1: Totals for selected products, excluding items shipped for free.
column2: Totals for selected products, excluding items shipped for free.

column1: Original product cart price, without discounts.
column2: Original product cart price, without discounts.

column1: Enter the surcharge or discount amount that'll be automatically multiplied by the product's weight to create a shipping rate.
column2: Enter the surcharge or discount amount that'll be automatically multiplied by the product's weight to create a shipping rate.

column1: Percentage of original product cart price is taken, without discounts.
column2: Percentage of original product cart price is taken, without discounts.

column1: The percentage will be added or deducted from the shipping rate. If it is 10% and UPS Ground is $25, the total shipping cost will be $27.5
column2: The percentage will be added or deducted from the shipping rate. If it is 10% and UPS Ground is $25, the total shipping cost will be $27.5

column1: This is the minimal amount, which will be added or deducted by this rule.
column2: This is the minimal amount, which will be added or deducted by this rule.

column1: This is the maximum amount, which will be added or deducted by this rule.
column2: This is the maximum amount, which will be added or deducted by this rule.

column1: Minimal total rate after the rule is applied.
column2: Minimal total rate after the rule is applied.

column1: Maximal total rate after the rule is applied.
column2: Maximal total rate after the rule is applied.

column1: Leave empty or select all to apply the rule to any
column2: Leave empty or select all to apply the rule to any

column1: Leave empty or select all to apply the rule to any group
column2: Leave empty or select all to apply the rule to any group

column1: We can't delete item right now. Please review the log and try again.
column2: We can't delete item right now. Please review the log and try again.

column1: We can't find a item to delete.
column2: We can't find a item to delete.

column1: Please select a rule to duplicate.
column2: Please select a rule to duplicate.

column1: The rule has been duplicated. Please feel free to activate it.
column2: The rule has been duplicated. Please feel free to activate it.

column1: Something went wrong while saving the item data. Please review the error log.
column2: Something went wrong while saving the item data. Please review the error log.

column1: We can't delete/activate/deactivate rule(s) right now. Please review the log and try again.
column2: We can't delete/activate/deactivate rule(s) right now. Please review the log and try again.

column1: We can't find a rule(s) to delete/activate/deactivate.
column2: We can't find a rule(s) to delete/activate/deactivate.
